question:
Which code snippet specifies the metadata for a servlet with:
(i) url mapping "/mytest"
(ii) Initial parameter with name "debug" and value "10"
(iii) Support asynchronous operation?

options.C:
@WebServlet(urlPatterns = {/"mytest"}, Initparams = {@InitParam(name="debug", value="10") }, supportAsync = true) 
  public class TestServlet extends HttpServlet {}
options.E:
@WebServlet (urlPatterns = {/"mytest"}, Initparam = @WebInitParam(name="debug", value="10"), supportAsync = true) 
  public class testServlet {}
options.D:
@WebServlet(urlPatterns = {/"mytest"}, Initparams = {@InitParam(name="debug", value="10") }, asyncSupported = true) 
  public class TestServlet extends HttpServlet {}
